entries.meaning: (Australia) Fibro-cement; a building material consisting of asbestos fibres and cement pressed into sheets.
examples: Every day, all day and all night sometimes, the town jammed jazz with bits of loose tin slapping around on top of the mud-stained fibro walls [â€¦].
When I got fibro, the Internet was not in common use, so I didn't have the resources that a newly diagnosed person would have now.
